title: Ep. 487 - Why The Left Never Says Sorry
description:
CNN’s Don Lemon makes an awkward on-air apology for mocking half of his fellow countrymen as ignorant, illiterate rubes. The only problem with his apology is he never actually apologized. We will examine why being a leftist means never having to say you’re sorry. 

Then, the fate of impeachment comes down to a nail-biter on Friday. We will take a look at the stakes. The Iowa caucuses are just four days away, and finally the Mailbag!

If you like The Michael Knowles Show, become a member TODAY with promo code: KNOWLES and enjoy the exclusive benefits for 10% off at dailywire.com/Knowles
